item.title: Battle over Elon Musk’s trillionaire pay package builds as pension funds face off against Tesla
item.description: Next month, investors will vote on setting Tesla CEO Elon Musk on the path to becoming the world’s first trillionaire.

item.title: Patagonia CEO says climate denialists are delusional: ‘If you step out of a window from the third floor talking about how gravity doesn’t exist, you’re still going to hit the ground’
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: How the world’s largest call center operator is blending artificial intelligence with emotional intelligence
item.description: Since 2023, Teleperformance has been widely adopting AI across internal and client operations—how is the company keeping its people engaged?
